instructions.description: Review all plan.json files in this coderef folder and report status

steps.description: List all features in coderef/working/ with their plan.json status
For each plan, determine: Is it active? Stale? Complete? Blocked?
Update this communication.json with findings in the audit_results section
Identify plans that should be archived (complete or abandoned)
Use /archive-feature workflow to move completed features to coderef/archived/

output_format.stale_plans: Plans with no recent activity (>7 days)
output_format.archive_candidates: Plans ready to archive (complete or abandoned)

communication_log.message: Requesting plan status audit. Review all working/ plans, report status, suggest archives.
